title: Remove text with conflict
useCase: Two users edit the same text within an element, one removes it before the other one changes its content.
outcome: Alice’s commit is successful, Bob’s commit is refused and he is asked to manually solve the conflict
scenarios: Alice checkouts repository; Bob checkouts repository; Alice edits file -  removes a text within a specific element; Bob edits the same file - edits the text within the same element; Alice commits changes; Bob commits changes;
